named-query.name: WorkflowProcess.readByCorrelationKey
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcess( info.processInstanceId,log.correlationKey,info.processId,info.startDate,log.end,log.duration,info.state ) FROM ProcessInstanceInfo info , ProcessInstanceLog log WHERE info.processInstanceId = log.processInstanceId AND log.correlationKey = :correlationKey

named-query.name: WorkflowProcess.readByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcess( info.processInstanceId,log.correlationKey,info.processId,info.startDate,log.end,log.duration,info.state ) FROM ProcessInstanceInfo info , ProcessInstanceLog log WHERE info.processInstanceId = log.processInstanceId AND info.processId = :processId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcess.readAll
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcess( info.processInstanceId,log.correlationKey,info.processId,info.startDate,log.end,log.duration,info.state ) FROM ProcessInstanceInfo info , ProcessInstanceLog log WHERE info.processInstanceId = log.processInstanceId
